articles.title: Porsche shares plunge after announcing EV rollout delay - BBC
articles.description: European carmakers face intense competition from Chinese rivals and weak demand for luxury cars.
articles.content:
Porsche's stock tumbled by more than 7% on Monday after warning last week that delays in its electric vehicle (EV) rollout will dent the carmaker's 2025 earnings.
Caught between electrification and … [+2001 chars]

articles.title: France formally recognises Palestinian state - BBC
articles.description: Donald Trump will address UN leaders on Tuesday, as more European countries look set to join the French policy change.
articles.content:
France has formally recognised a Palestinian state, becoming the latest in a wave of countries to take the step.
